title: On the Scene: Jason Lazarus, Wolfgang Plöger, Zoe Strauss
short_description: The Department of Photography’s continuing series On the Scene showcases the Art Institute’s commitment to collecting and exhibiting the most dynamic new work by emerging artists. The third exhibition in the series explores the diverse range of art being produced by Jason Lazarus, Wolfgang Plöger, and Zoe Strauss.

input: On the Scene: Jason Lazarus, Wolfgang Plöger, Zoe Strauss
